title: Every Champion should have at least five skins, and some less popular skins should be reworked
body:
Opinion: The skins available should be proportional to the popularity and viability of a champion.

Discuss.

replies.body: in time it will happen, riot has better things to do than make a tonne of skins atm.

> [{quoted}](name=FuyuMoro,realm=EUW,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=I6VA2ZiR,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-24T14:39:44.392+0000)
>
> Opinion: The skins available should be proportional to the popularity and viability of a champion.
> 
> Discuss.

Skins should go to whatever champ needs them, however you are naive to think that making/reworking skins is so easy that they could give each champ 5 and rework all "bad" ones the skin making process takes large amounts of time and resources. One skin could take anywhere from a few months to a year to make.
